bind.calculate: concat(concat(../patient_age_in_years, if(../patient_age_in_years =1,' an et ',' ans et ')),concat(../patient_age_in_months mod 12, if((../patient_age_in_months mod 12) =1,' mois',' mois')))

concat(concat(../patient_age_in_years, if(../patient_age_in_years =1,' year and ',' years and ')),concat(../patient_age_in_months mod 12, if((../patient_age_in_months mod 12) =1,' month old',' months old')))
if(../patient_sex = 'male' or ../patient_sex = 'homme' or ../patient_sex = 'Homme', 'Male', if(../patient_sex = 'female' or ../patient_sex = 'femme' or ../patient_sex = 'Femme', 'Female', ''))
if(../patient_sex = 'male' or ../patient_sex = 'homme' or ../patient_sex = 'Homme', 'Masculin', if(../patient_sex = 'female' or ../patient_sex = 'femme' or ../patient_sex = 'Femme', 'F√©minin', ''))
if( /delivery/pregnancy_register_date != '','Date must between pregnancy register date and today','Date must be in pass')
if( /delivery/pregnancy_register_date != '','La Date doit se situ√© entre la date enregistrement de grossesse et aujourdhui','La date doit √™tre au pass√©')

bind.constraint: /delivery/pregnancy_register_date != '' and . >= /delivery/pregnancy_register_date and . <= today() or /delivery/pregnancy_register_date = '' and . <= today()
